name: MACEDONIAN INSTITUTE FOR INTEGRATION
goal:
The main activities of Macedonian Institute for Integration are: promoting the Republic of Macedonia, EU affairs consultancy, lobbying and monitoring, support of Macedonian governmental, non-governmental and business stakeholders, project management in EU funded projects.
The services of MII are offered to organisations, natural and legal entities, companies and/or governmental institutions of the Republic of Macedonia.

The Brussels office address is:
Macedonian Institute for Integration
Square de Meeus 38/40
BE-1000 Brussels, Belgium
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Communication, Competition, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Consultation about Enterprises, Energy, Human rights, Environment, HORIZON 2020, ERASMUS PLUS.
